text: The Pope has called a crusade for Cairo, calling upon all righteous Catholics to take up the cross.
His Holiness hopes that the conquest of Egypt will provide for a staging ground to retake the rest of the Holy Land for Christianity.
The choice now befalls you: should you participate in the crusade you may gain the Pope's favour and many riches, but sit it out and there may be consequences.
It is expected that the great powers of the Catholic world will take up the cross and unite to invade Egypt.
As the owner of Cairo, your faction is the target of this crusade. It would be wise to focus your forces on defense, for the crusaders are soon to arrive...
